localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Browser Stealth Mode is a chrome extension that lets you browse and watch anything without worrying about who's looking over your shoulder. You can toggle stealth mode in your current tab. Stealth mode includes grayscale, hiding images/videos, and muting tab.
blogPost.body: Browser Stealth Mode is a chrome extension that lets you browse and watch anything without worrying about who's looking over your shoulder. You can toggle stealth mode in your current tab. Stealth mode includes grayscale, hiding images/videos, and muting tab.
blogPost.title: Browser Stealth Mode - Disguise your internet browsing activities
blogPost.author: Nivi Jayasekar

localize.description: 浏览器隐身模式是一个chrome扩展，让你浏览和观看任何东西，而不用担心谁在看你的肩膀。你可以在当前标签中切换隐身模式。隐身模式包括灰度、隐藏图片/视频和静音标签。
localize.tagline: 掩饰您的互联网浏览活动

localize.description: 瀏覽器隱身模式是一個chrome擴展，讓你瀏覽和觀看任何東西，而不用擔心誰在看你的肩膀。你可以在當前標籤中切換隱身模式。隱身模式包括灰度、隱藏圖片/視頻和靜音標籤。
localize.tagline: 掩飾您的互聯網瀏覽活動

previous.excerpt: Forky is a mind-mapping tool that is distraction free, with a minimal feature set. • colorful bubble and line diagrams • real-time collaboration • easy and quick to use • no distractions Web app in beta. Mobile coming soon!
previous.title: Forky - A minimalistic and distraction-free approach to mind-mapping

localize.description: Forky是一款无分心的思维导图工具，功能极少。- 五彩缤纷的气泡图和线条图--实时协作--简单快捷的使用--不分心 网络应用处于测试阶段。移动版即将推出
localize.tagline: 一种极简和无干扰的思维导图方法。

localize.description: Forky是一款無分心的思維導圖工具，功能極少。- 五彩繽紛的氣泡圖和線條圖--實時協作--簡單快捷的使用--不分心 網絡應用處於測試階段。移動版即將推出
localize.tagline: 一種極簡和無干擾的思維導圖方法。

Munger said a few years ago Buffett doesn’t believe in this thing anymore https://t.co/I1Zj8DxL1H

localize.full_text:
我一直看到人们在谈论 "巴菲特指标"，这清楚地表明我们正处于泡沫之中。

芒格几年前就说过巴菲特不相信这个东西了https://t.co/I1Zj8DxL1H。

我一直看到人們在談論 "巴菲特指標"，這清楚地表明我們正處於泡沫之中。

芒格幾年前就說過巴菲特不相信這個東西了https://t.co/I1Zj8DxL1H。
